show.subtitle: Your Economic Survival?  They're Not Looking Out For You.  We are.
show.title: The Wake Up Call

header.title: A New Look At The Great Depression

title: A New Look At The Great Depression
content:
Far from extricating the country from the Depression, FDR inherited a country where recovery from the Depression was... <!--more--> already in motion.
He managed to exacerbate the now-ended downturn by interfering with the organic recovery with his ridiculous policies and prolonging the agony for another fifteen needless years.
We take the story from the Great War up to the present day.
They won’t be teaching this version of events in American schools anytime soon… Listen to an 8-minute conversation between a Comcast sales rep and a customer trying to cancel his account!
The dollar’s fate since 1946.
